data.text: I am Nahum, from Elkosh village. This is a message about Nineveh city, the capital of Assyria that was given to me in a vision by Yahweh.
Yahweh our God ◄is jealous/does not want people to worship any other god►.
Yahweh does not quickly become angry;
When he commands oceans and rivers to become dry,
When he appears, it is as though the mountains shake and the hills melt;
There is no one [RHQ] who can resist him when he becomes extremely angry;
But he will get rid of his enemies;
So, it is useless [RHQ] for you people of Nineveh to plot against Yahweh.
It will be as though his enemies are tangled in thorns,
In Nineveh city there was a man who advised people to do very wicked things to Yahweh.
But this is what Yahweh says about you Israeli people:
Now I will cause the people of Assyria to no longer control/oppress you [MET];
And this is what Yahweh also declares about you people of Nineveh:
You people of Judah, look! A messenger will be coming across the mountains,
